sentences.en: Ammonia is a colourless gas a very pungent odour.
sentences.cn: 氨是一种具有强烈刺激性气味的无色气体.
一切都是那么寒冷而暗淡.

sentences.en: Her face was colourless, and she was shaking.
sentences.cn: 她脸色苍白，并且浑身发抖。

sentences.en: Her own language is not entirely colourless.
sentences.cn: 她的语言也不全都是文雅的.

sentences.en: His whole face was colourless rock; his eye was both spark and flint.
sentences.cn: 他整个的脸就象无色的岩石, 他的眼睛既象火星又象火石.

sentences.en: It is a colourless , odourless and tasteless gas, slightly heavier than air.
sentences.cn: 它是一种无色、无溴、无味的气体, 比空气稍重.

sentences.en: It is a colourless liquid with a burning taste.
sentences.cn: 这是有强烈味道的无色液体.

sentences.en: Outward appearance and use: Colourless transparent liquid, solvents and organic synthesis intermediates.
sentences.cn: 外观及用途: 无色透明液体, 溶剂和有机合成中间体.

sentences.en: Pure air is colourless and odourless.
She aimed her voice very pointedly at the colourless couple.
sentences.cn: 她话锋一转,锐利地指向那对平庸的夫妇.

sentences.en: The youngest among the women workers was as dull and colourless as the middle - aged.
sentences.cn: 最年轻的女工也同 中年 妇女一样郁郁寡欢,形容枯槁.

sentences.en: This allyl type resin is a highly transparent, colourless material.
sentences.cn: 这种烯丙基型的树脂是一种高度透明的 、 无色材料.

sentences.en: We hurried through the colourless little town set on the fast-flowing Nyakchu.
sentences.cn: 我们匆匆穿过湍急的那曲河畔这个毫无生气的小镇。

给…着色（colour的过去式和过去分词）
无色的；不生动的；颜色黯淡的

trans.tran_cn: 无色的，无趣的，不刺激的，呆板的
